name: best-webdriver
description: Best webdriver around using async/await, simplified down-to-earth API, easy to debug, 1:1 matching with the webdriver API. You will be testing in 20 minutes, not 20 hours

scripts.docs: rm -rf docs/*;node_modules/jsdoc/jsdoc.js --template node_modules/jsdoc-template -c .jsdoc.config.js -R GUIDE.md -P package.json; mv _out/*/*/** docs;rm -rf _out;touch docs/.nojekyll;scripts/readme > README.md

author: Tony Mobily
